author: cbs8
title: Pickup Trucks Market Development Trends and Competitive Landscape Analysis to 2020
text:
RnR Market Research
PUNE, India , September 25,
RnRMarketResearch.com adds Global Pickup Trucks Market 2015 Industry Research Report and Pickup Truck Market in the US 2015-2019 research reports to the automotive category of its online business intelligence library.
Complete report on global pickup trucks market spread across 122 pages, profiling 11 companies and supported with 195 tables and figures is now available at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/global-pickup-truck-industry-2015-market-research-report-market-report.html .
Global Pickup Trucks Market 2015 Industry Research Report is a professional and in-depth study that provides a basic overview of the industry including definitions, classifications, applications and industry chain structure. The pickup trucks market analysis is provided for the international markets including development trends, competitive landscape analysis, and key regions development status. Development policies and plans are discussed as well as manufacturing processes and cost structures are also analyzed. This report also states import/export consumption, supply and demand Figures, cost, price, revenue and gross margins.
The report focuses on global major leading industry players of pickup trucks market providing information such as company profiles, product picture and specification, capacity, production, price, cost, revenue and contact information. Upstream raw materials and equipment and downstream demand analysis is also carried out. The Pickup Trucks market development trends and marketing channels are analyzed. Finally the feasibility of new investment projects are assessed and overall research conclusions offered.
With 195 tables and figures that help evaluate pickup trucks market analysis, this research provides key statistics on the state of the industry and is a valuable source of guidance and direction for companies and individuals interested in the market. Companies profiled in this report include FCA US , Ford Motor, General Motors, Nissan, Toyota, Daimler Trucks North America, Honda, Isuzu Commercial Truck of America, Tiger Truck Industries International, VIA Motors and Volkswagen. Order a copy of Global Pickup Trucks Industry 2015 Market Research Report at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/contacts/purchase?rname=405562 .
Another regional pickup trucks market report for US forecasts a 4.01% CAGR for United States pickup truck market over the period of 2014-2019. The pickup trucks segment in the US is one of the most popular segments of the automotive market in the US and advanced features are improving their demand. The report includes the unit sales of pickup trucks in the US by OEMs. The pickup trucks market in the US is segmented as per the product type into small/mid-sized pickup truck and full-size pickup truck.
Commenting on the report, an analyst said: "The advent of electric pickup trucks is a key trend observed in the US pickup trucks market. Electric vehicles have the capability to provide plenty of torque from a very low RPM. This makes electric vehicles a perfect option for being used as a pickup truck because of fuel bill savings." According to the report, the high adaptability and demand of pickup trucks is a major driver that propels growth in this market. Since the latest generation products of pickup trucks market are more fuel-efficient, small business owners spend less on gas, making it more preferable for them to purchase one.
FCA US , Ford Motor, General Motors, Nissan, Toyota, Daimler Trucks North America LLC, Honda, Isuzu Commercial Truck of America, Tiger Truck Industries International, Inc., VIA Motors Inc., and Volkswagen are companies mentioned in the Pickup Truck Market in the US 2015-2019 research report available at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/pickup-truck-market-in-the-us-2015-2019-market-report.html .
Explore more reports on automotive market at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/reports/automotive-transportation/automotive .
